about_the_game:
Bobby is a seemingly simple platformer. You should use the key arrows to jump and walk around the screen. However, the game also has a dark side — everything in this game can and will kill you.

We work hard to make each trap unique and each of your deaths sophisticated.
It’s going to take you a lot of time to figure out how each trap on your way works and get to the checkpoint.

You can't trust anything in this game! Every step you take, you risk losing your head, failing, being burned, eaten, trampled, broken morally and physically.
But don't worry — you won't know it until you take this step!

We are trying to make every creature in the game memorable and its animations "alive", which is not typical for a pixel game.

Besides:
The game has a simple but absurd and humorous storyline.
We also working hard on music and sounds.

Bobby is the debut project of the "Yo You Games" studio.
This is a little game for a couple of nights that will give you a lot of fun and thrill.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: Bobby - Pixel indie platformer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
